text.textblock: Per Diem, Travel and Transportation Allowance Committee

agency.textblock: Per Diem, Travel and Transportation Allowance Committee.

action.textblock: Publication of changes in per diem rates.

summary.textblock: The Per Diem, Travel and Transportation Allowance Committee is publishing Civilian Personnel Per Diem Bulletin Number 175. This bulletin lists changes in per diem rates prescribed for U.S. Government employees for official travel in Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, the Northern Mariana Islands and Possessions of the United States. Bulletin Number 175 is being published in the
to assure that travelers are paid per diem at the most current rates.

supplem.textblock: This document gives notice of changes in per diem rates prescribed by the Per Diem, Travel and Transportation Allowance Committee for non-foreign areas outside the continental United States. Distribution of Civilian Personnel Per Diem Bulletins by mail was discontinued effective 1 June 1979. Per Diem Bulletins published periodically in the
now constitute the only notification of change in per diem rates to agencies and establishments outside the Department of Defense.
